text.section:
Each wholesaler shall:
keep an invoice for each purchase of tax stamps;
maintain a daily record of the tax stamps affixed to cigarette packages; and
maintain a complete and accurate record of each sale of cigarettes or other tobacco products for resale outside of the State.

A wholesaler shall:
keep the records required under subsection (a) of this section for a period of 6 years or for a shorter period that the Comptroller authorizes; and
allow the Comptroller to examine the records.
